level1.riddle: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
What has keys but can’t open locks?

level2.riddle: I’m tall when I’m young, and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
What is full of holes but still holds water?

level3.riddle: What has a heart that doesn’t beat?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
What has hands but can’t clap?

level4.riddle: What has a neck but no head?
What has an eye but can’t see?
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not alive?

level5.riddle: What has a ring but no finger?
What has a bark but no bite?
What has a face and two hands but no arms or legs?

bonus.riddle: What can be cracked, made, told, and played?
What has keys but can’t open locks?
What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
